txt.en: 'You've arrived at last! Hurry, hurry! You need to drink six more beers before the time expires. No time to waste, only time to drink!'

'Well done, friend! You still have quite some way to go.\n\n'You've now completed stage four, only three more to go if you wish to become a member of the Inn League!  The Green Dragon is just down the road in Bywater. Stumble along now.'
Inn League Initiation -- Floating Log
Time expired!
'Hurry to The Floating Log in Frogmorton and speak with the Inn League member there. Hurry! Time is a-wasting.'
'Drunk already? You've barely begun!'
The Floating Log is in Frogmorton on the banks of the Frogmoors, north of the Road.\n\nHead to The Floating Log in Frogmorton and talk to the Inn League member there.
'Good, good...almost half-way done!'
Drink beers (4/6)
Drink six beers within the allotted amount of time.
'Oh dear, you look a bit flushed. Are you feeling ill?'
Drank beers (5/6)
Drink five more beers within the allotted amount of time.
'This is quite disturbing to watch, let me assure you!'
Drink beers (5/6)
Drink four more beers within the allotted amount of time.
'You're almost done! Don't bother breathing, just finish it!'
Drank beers (6/6)
Drink three more beers within the allotted amount of time.
Finish before time runs out!
Drink two more beers within the allotted amount of time.
Drink one more beer within the allotted amount of time.
Full and queasy with drink, you should now speak to the Inn League member in front of you.
Talk to the Inn League Member in The Floating Log
Drink beers (0/6)
Drank beers (1/6)
Drink beers (1/6)
Drank beers (2/6)
Drink beers (2/6)
Drank beers (3/6)
Drink beers (3/6)
Drank beers (4/6)

You have expressed an interest in becoming a member of the Inn League. In order to do so, you must pass their initiation. This is a long race and only the stout of stomach and strong of will can complete it.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends. </rgb>
You have begun stage four of the Inn League's initiation.
